item.title: Hong Kong Crypto Unicorn Hashkey Secures $30 Million From Early PDD Investor Gaorong
item.description: Beijing-based Gaorong Ventures’ investment values the crypto exchange operator at nearly $1.5 billion post-money.

item.title: Apple Refurbished Mac mini Is Now Ridiculously Cheap
item.description: Apple drops the price of a refurbished Mac mini to just over $300, making it cheaper than ever to become a Mac owner.
